Name: The Paribneur Combination
About the game: The Paribneur Combination is a thriller/horror game set in the 90's, where the detective Darren Wolfe is sent to investigate the old building of a company that shut down years ago. You are suddenly trapped inside, and must find a new exit. Explore Explore the abandoned facilities of Paribneur Industries, and collect items that will aid you along the way, as you are forced to find a new way out. Unveil Secrets Listen to voice logs and read old papers, and discover the past. Unveil the true intentions of the company. Discover the dark secrets that Paribneur Industries was keeping, and find your way out. Solve The Combination Solve The Paribneur Combination, and escape the facility. Tread Carefully Otherwordly entities roam the halls...
